title: Inernal Nasus and DJ Sona VO
body:
So, after reading the 6.9 Patch and noticing Gravelord Azir's bugfix, I'm not sure if Riot noticed or not, but there is currently a similar bug with Inernal Nasus and DJ Sona. Nasus will sometimes play base VO over certain lines (i.e. laugh), and DJ Sona will occasionally play normal lines instead of, as well.
{{champion:75}} {{champion:37}}

replies.body: Sona's VO have been heard in DJ Sona since her release randomly. It's a known bug.
Thanks for the report! We are aware of the issue and are working on a fix. ^-^
